resources.name: Hydronium Condensate
resources.description: Liquid energy extracted from the atmosphere. Used to power basic machines.

resources.name: Raw Scrap
resources.description: Debris or minerals extracted from the ground. Used for basic constructions.

resources.name: Structured Alloy
resources.description: Reinforced material derived from scrap. Used for advanced units and buildings.

resources.name: Flux Crystals
resources.description: Exotic materials channeling energy. Required for tech modules and spells.

resources.name: Ion Field
resources.description: Transformed energy stock. Used to activate modules and vision.

resources.name: Organo-Acid Gel
resources.description: Harvested alien substance. Used for offensive hybrid modules.

resources.name: Compute Units
resources.description: Internal currency of the robotic base. Used for purchases and upgrades.

resources.name: Xeno Samples
resources.description: Alien DNA fragments. Enable activation of mutagenic functions.

buildings.name: Hydronium Condenser
buildings.desc: Generates condensate for basic energy needs.

buildings.name: Logic Refinery
buildings.desc: Converts raw scrap into structured alloy.

buildings.name: Flux Catalyst
buildings.desc: Generates a random technological protocol every 20 seconds.

buildings.name: Drone Station
buildings.desc:
Produces basic dronoids.
Product: Unit (+1 per cycle, Capacity: 3)

buildings.name: Structure Decompiler
buildings.desc: Disassembles advanced alloys to recover raw scrap.

buildings.name: Ion Refinery
buildings.desc: Converts hydronium condensate and raw scrap into ion fields.

buildings.name: Sentinel Bunker
buildings.desc: Deploys sentinel guard units to defend the base.

buildings.name: Xeno-Mechanical Forge
buildings.desc: Assembles Mobile Anvils with advanced hybrid structures.

buildings.name: Alpha Biocuve
buildings.desc: Synthesizes organo-acid gel from atmospheric spores.

buildings.name: Quantum Compressor
buildings.desc: Condenses energy to produce Flux Crystals.

buildings.name: Logic Cluster
buildings.desc: Centralizes processing units to produce computational power.

buildings.name: Logic Supercluster
buildings.desc: Groups several cores to maximize Compute Units.

buildings.name: Xeno Extractor
buildings.desc: Harvests genetic samples from alien corpses.

enemies.name: Basic Monster
enemies.desc: A basic monster, appearing in the early waves.

enemies.name: Basic Ranged Monster
enemies.desc: A basic monster, appearing in the early waves.

enemies.name: Ramming Carapace
enemies.desc: Ignores allied units and rushes toward the base to crush it.

enemies.name: Baby Slime
enemies.desc: Small slime spawned from a fission.

units.name: Elite Sniper
units.desc: Very long-range but fragile ranged unit.

artifacts.name: Empathic Repairer
artifacts.desc: When a unit dies, another allied unit is slightly healed.

artifacts.name: Unstable Core
artifacts.desc: When a unit dies, an enemy suffers 2 damage.

artifacts.name: Centralized Support
artifacts.desc: When a unit dies, the base is slightly healed.

artifacts.name: Reversal Nanotools
artifacts.desc: The Structure Decompiler recovers +1 scrap per cycle.

artifacts.name: Auto-Extraction
artifacts.desc: Every 5s, gain 1 Xeno Sample per active reactor or refinery.

spells.name: EMP Surge
spells.desc: Temporarily neutralizes enemies in an area.

spells.name: Ion Storm
spells.desc: Deals damage to all enemies in the area.

spells.name: Pulse Heal
spells.desc: Heals all allied units in an area.

spells.name: Regeneration Field
spells.desc: Heals allies within the area for 10 seconds.

ui.talent_starter_base_hp_description: Start the game with 20 extra HP for the base.
ui.talent_starter_drone_description: Begin with a friendly drone ready to defend the base.
ui.talent_resource_node_scanner_description: Detects special tiles that boost production if built upon.
ui.talent_artifact_scanner_description: Increases your chances to find artifacts after each wave.
ui.talent_starter_spell_building_descriptio: Start the game with a Flux Catalyst building card.
